title: Gartenbeiz zum Gaul
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Place with urban atmosphere at the train station "Hardbrücke" and is frequented by a younger crowd. Offers fast food with vegan choices like vegan burger, fish n' chips, köfte, and even vegan muffins and mousse au chocolat. Has soy milk for coffee. Sources local, organic, and fair trade. Small bites and coffee in the morning; kitchen opens 11:30am-10:30pm.
